prompts.oDataSourceTooltip: Select the OData service you want to replace
prompts.oDataSourceURITooltip: Enter the URI for the new OData source
prompts.maxAgeTooltip: (Optional) Enter the time in seconds it takes for a cached response of the service to expire.
prompts.oDataAnnotationSourceURITooltip: Server side annotations have been detected for the selected OData service. If needed, enter new annotation data source URI  for the changed service
prompts.oDataURIInfoLabel: Have in mind that common OData Service path prefixes are '{{- v2Prefix}}' or '{{- v4Prefix}}'
prompts.isInSafeModeLabel: Making manifest changes is not upgrade safe and the project will be set in advanced mode. Please continue if you are sure you want to have your project in advanced mode.
prompts.oDataURIV2InfoLabel: Have in mind that you are trying to replace OData {{versionOne}} Service with OData {{versionTwo}} Service
prompts.addAnnotationOdataSourceTooltip: Select the annotation file from your workspace
prompts.filePathTooltip: Select the annotation file from your workspace
prompts.targetEnvTooltip: Select the target environment for your Adaptation Project
prompts.appTitleTooltip: Enter an application title for your application variant
prompts.systemTooltip: Select a system to load its application list
prompts.usernameLabel: Enter the user name for the backend system
prompts.passwordLabel: Enter the password for the backend system
prompts.projectTypeTooltip: Select the type of the project you want to create
prompts.applicationListTooltip: Select the application for which you want to create an app variant
prompts.appInfoLabel: Have in mind that synchronous views are detected for this application and controller extensions are not supported for such views. Controller extension functionality on these views will be disabled.
prompts.v4AppNotOfficialLabel: You have selected an app based on SAP Fiori elements for OData V4. Note the following important information when you create adaptation changes: https://wiki.wdf.sap.corp/wiki/display/fioritech/Adaptation+Project+Support
prompts.ui5VersionTooltip: Select the SAP UI5 version you want to use for preview of your app variant
prompts.currentUI5VersionTooltip: This is the current latest UI5 version which is available in cloud systems
prompts.fioriIdHint: This is an one-time, semantic identifier for the app variant. The Fiori ID will be shown in the 'About' section of the app for ease of identification and will also be available in the Fiori Apps Reference Library.
prompts.adpNotSupported: NOTE: The selected application is not supported by Adaptation Project
prompts.notSupportedAdpOverAdpLabel: You have selected Adaptation Project as base. The selected system has SAPUI5 version lower than 1.90 and it does not support Adaptation Project as а base for a new Adaptation Project. You will be able to create such а project, but after deployment it will not work until the UI5 version of the system is updated.
prompts.isPartiallySupportedAdpOverAdpLabel: You have selected Adaptation Project as а base. The selected system has SAPUI5 version lower than 1.96 and in order for your Adaptation Project based on Adaptation Project to work after deployment, you will need to apply SAP Note 756 SP0 on your system.
prompts.projectTypeInfoTooltip: The only available project type from the selected system is: {{type}}.
prompts.achHint: The purpose of ACH components is to enable the support organization to indicate which BCP/ticket component might be responsible for a particular issue.
prompts.createExtProjectLabel: Do you want to create an Extension Project with name '{{value}}' instead?
prompts.createExtProjectWithSyncViewsLabel: Do you want to create an Extension Project with name '{{value}}' instead? It will give you the ability to create controller extensions for the synchronous views as well as the asynchronous.
prompts.flpInfo: Original application target mapping and the default parameters can be found in Fiori reference library under Implementation Information -> Configuration -> Target Mapping(s) in
prompts.title: Title
prompts.subtitle: Subtitle
prompts.packageInputChoice: How do you want to enter the Package

validators.annotationFileAlreadyExists: There is already an annotation file with the same name, please choose another file or rename the file and select it again
validators.externalLoginDisabled: CF Login cannot be detected as extension in current installation of VSCode, please refer to documentation (link not yet available) in order to install it.
validators.projectNameLengthErrorExt: The name cannot contain more than 61 characters or end with 'component'.
validators.projectNameLengthErrorInt: The name cannot start with 'customer' or contain more than 61 characters or end with 'component'.
validators.projectNameValidationErrorExt: The name must contain only Latin alphanumeric characters. Different parts can be separated by period and every part must start with a letter.
validators.projectNameValidationErrorInt: The name must contain only Latin alphanumeric characters and it must have at least two parts. The different parts must be separated by period and every part must start with a letter.
validators.projectNameUppercaseError: The name cannot contain uppercase letters.
validators.namespaceSameAsProjectNameError: Namespace should be the same as Project Name.
validators.namespaceLengthError: Namespace cannot contain more than 61 characters or end with 'component'.
validators.namespaceValidationError: The namespace must contain only Latin alphanumeric characters. Different parts can be separated by period and every part must start with a letter.
validators.systemClientMandatoryError: System client can contain only digits.
validators.unsupportedSystemInt: The system that you have selected cannot be detected to be of type OnPremise. You should select system of this type in order to continue with the generation of the project.
validators.unsupportedSystemExt: The system that you have selected cannot be detected to be of type OnPremise or of type CloudReady. You should select system of either of both types in order to continue with the generation of the project.
validators.unsupportedCloudSystemInt: You have selected system that does not support OnPremise adaptation projects. Please select such system.
validators.cannotLoadApplicationsError: Cannot load applications from the system.
validators.appDoesNotSupportManifest: Select a different application. The selected application is not supported by Adaptation Project. Please refer to SAPUI5 Adaptation Project documentation for more information.
validators.appDoesNotSupportAdaptation: Select a different application. Selected application does not support Flexibility and therefore it does not support Adaptation Project.
validators.ui5VersionNotReachableError: The url of the UI5 version you have selected is not reachable. <URL> should be made accessible through cloud connector and destination configuration in order to be consumed within SAPUI5 Adaptation project and its SAPUI5 Visual Editor.
validators.ui5VersionOutdatedError: The SAPUI5 version you have selected is not compatible with SAPUI5 Visual Editor. Please select a different version.
validators.ui5VersionNotDetectedError: The UI5 version of the selected system could not be determined. You will be able to create and edit Adaptation project with the newest version, but it will not be usable on this system until system`s UI5 version is not upgraded to at least 1.71.
validators.adpPluginSmartTemplateProjectError: Select a different application. Adaptation project doesn't support the selected application.
validators.notDeployableNotFlexEnabledSystemError: The system that you have selected is not an ABAP On-Premise system. Adaptation Project is supported only on such systems, so please choose ABAP On-Premise system which supports Flexibility and DTA_FOLDER deployment.
validators.notFlexEnabledError: The system that you have selected is not an ABAP On-Premise system which supports Flexibility. Adaptation Project is supported only on such systems, so please choose ABAP On-Premise system which supports Flexibility. If you continue, you will be able to create only an Extension Project.
validators.notDeployableSystemError: The system that you have selected is not an ABAP On-Premise system which supports DTA_FOLDER deployment. Adaptation Project is supported only on such systems, so please choose ABAP On-Premise system which supports DTA_FOLDER deployment.
validators.achMandatoryError: Application Component Hierarchy can contain only capital letters, digits, and dashes.
validators.manifestCouldNotBeValidated: Manifest of the selected application could not be validated
validators.invalidsemanticObject: Semantic Object should contain only alphanumerical characters and '_' up to 30 characters.
validators.invalidaction: Action should contain only alphanumerical characters and '_' up to 60 characters.
validators.invalidAbapRepository: Repository name does not match the expected format. Expected format is '/<namespace>/<repository_name>'  or just a single repository name as a string. Namespace can be up to 8 symbols and repository name can be up to 15 symbols. Only alphanumeric and _ symbols are allowed

tooltips.inboundId: Choose the inboundID that will be used to set the FLP tile configuration
tooltips.flpConfigurationType: Selected FLP Configuration type is: Add new tile
tooltips.semanticObject: Enter the semantic object for the inbound which will be created for your adaptation project
tooltips.action: Enter the action for the inbound which will be created for your adaptation project
tooltips.title: Enter title for your FLP configuration
tooltips.subtitle: Enter subtitle for your FLP configuration
tooltips.parameters: Enter the value for the parameters in the Target Mappings section from the URL mentioned above
tooltips.abapRepository: Enter the SAPUI5 ABAP Repository that should be used for the deployment of your Adaptation Project. Expected format is '/<namespace>/<repository_name>' if you want to add a namespace or just a single repository name as a string. Namespace can be up to 8 symbols and repository name can be up to 15 symbols.  Both the SAPUI5 ABAP Repository and the package that will be used should start in the same way, i.e. a namespace or a Z, Y or 'SAP'
tooltips.deployConfigDescription: Enter a description for your deployment
